DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate bioequivalence eptacog alfa A 6 mg NovoSeven® healthy male subject .
DOC.brief_title: Investigating Bioequivalence Eptacog Alfa A 6 mg NovoSeven® Healthy Male Subjects
DOC.criteria: Male , age 1855 year , inclusive , time signing informed consent Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 18.530 kg/m^2 , inclusive Good general health base assessment medical history , vital sign , physical examination , ECG ( electrocardiogram ) , laboratory data screening , judge investigator Known history thromboembolic event ( ) potential thromboembolic risk judge investigator
